Question
========
What is characteristic of a dichotomous variable?

Answerlist
----------
* Although a dichotomous variable is actually nominal, it always has a fixed ranking from low (0) to high (1).
* A dichotomous variable always consists of only one category.
* For a dichotomous variable, 50% of the observations are always above the average and 50% below the average.
* Although a dichotomous variable is actually nominal, you can still meaningfully calculate an average from it.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
